original_text: By utilizing WebAssembly in the cloud, our platform can execute complex training modules and simulations on the server and return only the necessary HTML to the user’s browser.
units: By utilizing WebAssembly in the cloud , our platform can execute complex training modules and simulations on the server and return only the necessary HTML to the user ’s browser .
return only the necessary HTML to the user ’s browser

original_text: The system can generate and send xAPI statements to any compatible Learning Record Store (LRS), enabling the capture of informal learning, simulations, and other training data outside of traditional course structures.
units: The system can generate and send xAPI statements to any compatible Learning Record Store ( LRS ) , enabling the capture of informal learning , simulations , and other training data outside of traditional course structures .
send xAPI statements to any compatible Learning Record Store ( LRS ) , enabling the capture of informal learning , simulations , and other training data outside of traditional course structures

original_text: In other words, any code within the course (such as quiz logic or simulations) runs in a secure WebAssembly sandbox on the server, and the server generates the resulting HTML interface for the learner.
units: In other words , any code within the course ( such as quiz logic or simulations ) runs in a secure WebAssembly sandbox on the server , and the server generates the resulting HTML interface for the learner .
the server generates the resulting HTML interface for the learner .

original_text: The WebAssembly engine then updates the course state on the server and the server responds with a new HTML page or snippet.
units: The WebAssembly engine then updates the course state on the server and the server responds with a new HTML page or snippet .
the server responds with a new HTML page or snippet .

original_text: For xAPI-based content, the server captures learning experience events and generates corresponding xAPI statements.
units: For xAPI - based content , the server captures learning experience events and generates corresponding xAPI statements .
